definition: absolute, total, the experience of being alive
details:
adjective
- absolute, total
= example: absolute, total
- still in active use
= example: still in active use
- still in existence
= example: still in existence
= synonyms: extant, surviving
- true to life
- pertaining to living persons
= example: pertaining to living persons
- (used of minerals or stone) in its natural state and place
noun
- the experience of being alive
= synonyms: life
- people who are still living
= example: people who are still living
- the financial means whereby one lives
= synonyms: support
- the condition of living or the state of being alive
= synonyms: life
